title: Design Quantum Dot Solar Concentrator Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the Quantum Dot Solar Concentrator system.

title: Research and Compile Quantum Dot Properties
description: Gather and document the properties of quantum dots that will be used in the solar concentrator, focusing on those properties relevant to energy capture, stability, and cost-effectiveness.
dependencies: Design Quantum Dot Solar Concentrator Architecture

title: Develop Optimal Lens Design for Light Concentration
description: Create the optimal lens design to focus sunlight onto the quantum dots.
dependencies: Design Quantum Dot Solar Concentrator Architecture

title: Develop Quantum Dot Coating Technique
description: Create a technique for coating solar cells with quantum dots.
dependencies: Design Quantum Dot Solar Concentrator Architecture

title: Implement Light Harvesting and Energy Transfer Mechanisms
description: Develop the light harvesting and energy transfer mechanisms for efficient solar energy conversion.
dependencies: Design Quantum Dot Solar Concentrator Architecture

title: Perform Simulations and Testing of Proposed Designs
description: Simulate and test the proposed designs to validate their performance.
dependencies: Design Quantum Dot Solar Concentrator Architecture

title: Write Technical Documentation for the Project
description: Document the project design, methodology, and results for publication.
dependencies: Perform Simulations and Testing of Proposed Designs
